name: 1812 (itch)
description:
1812 is an upcoming virtual reality multiplayer FPS that aims to bridge the gap between realism and fun gameplay.

Based on the War of 1812, players will come into battle equipped with primitive weapons that will put their skills to the test. Choose from an arsenal of muskets, flintlock pistols, and sabres as you charge through lush natural environments to the enemy line!

The game is in the early stages of development and is expected to be ready for release late 2019.
